Properties: Represents the company/organization behind the website. Improves brand knowledge panel.
Recommended Fields: logo sameAs contactPoint address description foundingDate

Properties: Represents a software application. Shows app info in search results with ratings and price.
Represents a product for sale. Enables rich snippets with price availability and reviews.
Recommended Fields: description image offers sku brand review aggregateRating

Properties: Represents a FAQ page. Enables FAQ rich snippets in search results.
Recommended Fields: Each Q&A needs @type Question name acceptedAnswer
JSON-LD Example: { '@context': 'https://schema.org', '@type': 'FAQPage', 'mainEntity': [{ '@type': 'Question', 'name': 'How do I get started?', 'acceptedAnswer': { '@type': 'Answer', 'text': 'Sign up for free and...' } }] }

Properties: Represents breadcrumb navigation. Shows page hierarchy in search results.
Recommended Fields: Each item needs @type ListItem position name item

Properties: Represents an article or blog post. Enables article rich snippets.
JSON-LD Example: { '@context': 'https://schema.org', '@type': 'Article', 'headline': 'How to Grow Your YouTube Channel', 'datePublished': '2024-01-15', 'author': { '@type': 'Person', 'name': 'John Doe' }, 'publisher': { '@type': 'Organization', 'name': 'TubeSpark' } }

Properties: Represents the website. Can enable sitelinks searchbox in search results.
Represents a local business with physical location. Shows business info in local search.
Represents how-to instructions. Enables how-to rich snippets with steps.
Recommended Fields: description image totalTime estimatedCost supply tool
JSON-LD Example: { '@context': 'https://schema.org', '@type': 'HowTo', 'name': 'How to Create Your First Script', 'step': [{ '@type': 'HowToStep', 'name': 'Choose a topic', 'text': 'Select a trending topic...' }] }

Properties: Represents a video. Enables video rich snippets and video carousel.
JSON-LD Example: { '@context': 'https://schema.org', '@type': 'VideoObject', 'name': 'Getting Started with TubeSpark', 'description': 'Learn how to use TubeSpark', 'thumbnailUrl': 'https://example.com/thumb.jpg', 'uploadDate': '2024-01-15', 'duration': 'PT5M30S' }
